content: Are there any Canadian insurance companies in the process of upgrading or already upgraded to FHIR for electronic claims for Group insurance?

I believe Telus was working with some insurers to receive direct FHIR delivery. I don't know who though. Email me at lmckenzie@gevityinc.com and I'll put you in touch with someone from the project who may be able to provide more detail. (Unfortunately they're not here for me to ping directly.)
Thank you! Iâ€™ve sent you an email.
